scripts.create:local: yarn prepare:local && graph create gnosis/cow --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:local: yarn prepare:local && yarn codegen && graph deploy gnosis/cow --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn codegen && graph deploy gnosis/cow --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && yarn codegen && graph deploy gnosis/cow-rinkeby --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:gc: yarn prepare:gc && yarn codegen && graph deploy gnosis/cow-gc --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:dev: yarn prepare:<Network> && yarn codegen && graph <YourGithubUser/YourSubgraph> --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
